doc.headline: CPW - So where are you from?
doc.post:
Just curious :) I live... East Coast (36.7%)
South (10.8%)
Midwest (25%)
West Coast (7.5%)
Canada (OR any state bordering Canada not on the East or West Coast) (10%)
SS ? (5%)
TEXAS (by Popular request) (5%)
Total Votes: 120
Texas! :-D
Louisiana. People comment all the time that I don't have an accent.
I voted SS because I am "from" the east coast (NYC via NEPA), but currently live on the west coast (SF).

Texas! :-D
Is that considered the West? SouthWest?
I voted SS because I'm "from" Canada, but I live in New Jersey
I love NJ :) NOTE: Might be slightly bias because I was born and raised here. I live in Passaic Co in NJ now.
East Coast! Philadelphia suburbs until 2 years ago when I moved to the Annapolis area.
Iowa here! Anyone else from Iowa?
Oregon born and raised

I love NJ :) NOTE: Might be slightly bias because I was born and raised here. I live in Passaic Co in NJ now.
I live in Ocean County, I've been here almost 3 years now. There are things I love (people down here are so relaxed compared with the cities I've lived in!), and things that drive me crazy (NJ drivers are insane!) It's bizarre because I would never in a million years have ever expected to live here, but it's where we ended up for DH's job and we're really happy here.
I'm going to answer where I am "from" not where I currently live I am from the east coast from birth to after college.
Ahem. Texas needs it's own button. Thank you. :)
Northern VA right outside of D.C.

I love NJ :) NOTE: Might be slightly bias because I was born and raised here. I live in Passaic Co in NJ now.
I live in Ocean County, I've been here almost 3 years now. There are things I love (people down here are so relaxed compared with the cities I've lived in!), and things that drive me crazy (NJ drivers are insane!) It's bizarre because I would never in a million years have ever expected to live here, but it's where we ended up for DH's job and we're really happy here.
I have family that lives in Lakewood and if you live in NJ you have to go to Ocean County some time during the summer (Ocean and all). It's funny b/c DH and I said if we ever move it would be to Canada (Montreal to be specific).

I love NJ :) NOTE: Might be slightly bias because I was born and raised here. I live in Passaic Co in NJ now.

It's bizarre because I would never in a million years have ever expected to live here, but it's where we ended up for DH's job and we're really happy here.
I loooove NJ! My family has a house on Long Beach Island and we try to go up there every summer. Anyway, NJ holds a special place in my heart b/c DH and I got engaged there :)
Florida girl here!

Yeah, weekend traffic is horrendous. We try to arrive during the week and it's not too bad and then once we're there, we walk everywhere. I love it.. SO much different than the picture of the Jersey Shore that most people automatically think of!
Representing Montana. :)
I live in Texas, but clicked that I'm from the midwest. My time spent in WI is far longer than I've been in TX so far.

New Yoooooork. NJ smells.
I'm a buckeye!!
East coast! Grew up in CT. Lived in FL for 8 years and am currently in SC.
I'm a Masshole!!! lol
I voted Midwest but apparently should have voted "Canada" based on the definitions.
North Carolina

You need to add "Southeast," because while I live in the south - North Carolina, I don't live in Alabama, Mississippi or Georgia (where I consider the "south"). Plus, I live on the east coast. So I need a Southeast option to really show where I live.

New Yoooooork. NJ smells.
Hee hee!! New Yawwwwwkkkk here too.
I'm from Jersey City, NJ...where Snooki and J-wow are living right now LOL!
BAMA baby :)
Ontario, CANADA!

BAMA baby :)
Roll tide.
Another Texan!
I clicked special snowflake because I'm from the Pacific Northwest (Washington side of the WA/OR border across from Portland) but I live in the Southwest (Central Arizona).
